#summary The navigator.systemLanguage property
#labels about-dom,is-dom-property,from-microsoft

== Values ==

The `navigator.systemLanguage` property returns a string.

[BrowserFamilyMSIE Internet Explorer] returns your operating system language and country code.  Example: `"en-us"`.

This property is read-only.
